book.synopsis: Classic Victorian tale of the last days of Pompeii, doomed city that lay at the feet of Mount Vesuvius. From poets to flower-girls, gladiators to Roman tribunes, here is a plausible story of their lives, their loves, and the tragic fate that awaited them.
book.dimensions: Height: 9 Inches, Length: 5.75 Inches, Weight: 1.2 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
